name: The Voyager's Trail
description:
Can you make it to the island?

Click your way across the sea and try to keep your crew alive.

Featuring:

-Paddling

-Fishing

-Water!

V.1.1 Post Jam Version now playable online!

Now featuring:

-Game Over screen tips.

-Fishing explanations.

-A display to show when you're refilling water.

-Clearer paddling and fishing icons.

-DYSENTERY!
